description.narrative: Since the last five years, South Asian Women Development Forum has been organizing its annual International Women Entrepreneurs Summits, playing the role of a catalyst for policy advocacy on gender neutral trade policy in promoting women entrepreneurship, initiatives on innovative projects, transfer of technology and skills, collaborations and partnerships. This year the “International Women Entrepreneurs Summit- 2019”, with the theme “Harnessing Economic Empowerment” is scheduled for September 13th- 14th in Kathmandu, Nepal.

activity-date.narrative: iT is scheduled for September 13th- 14th in Kathmandu, Nepal.

recipient-country.narrative: The International Summit will create an impact with the coming together of the most relevant stakeholders and leaders from the US, UK, Europe, SAARC, ASEAN, Africa and MENA regions,

sector.narrative: 1. To re-galvanize, strengthen and empower the economic issues of women through the international women entrepreneurs’ annual hub for networking and connecting women SMEs to explore significant opportunities in cooperation and joint investments with potential counterparts through regional and international collaborations
